definition.name: Azure Pipelines Action
definition.description: Trigger a run in Azure pipelines

inputs.name: azure-devops-project-url
inputs.description: Fullyqualified URL to the Azure DevOps organization along with project name(eg, https://dev.azure.com/organization/project-name or https://server.example.com:8080/tfs/DefaultCollection/project-name)

inputs.name: azure-pipeline-name
inputs.description: Name of the Azure Pipline to be triggered

inputs.name: azure-devops-token
inputs.description: Paste personal access token of the user as value of secret variable:AZURE_DEVOPS_TOKEN

evidence.reasoning: The action is designed to trigger a run in Azure pipelines, which is primarily a deployment task. It also involves communication with Azure DevOps services.
